mapper.insert: insert into chat_groups (name, createdby, createdat) values (#{name}, #{createdBy}, now())
mapper.select: select cg.id, cg.name as groupName, cg.createdby, cg.createdat, ( select message from chat_log cl where cl.groupid = cg.id order by cl.createdat desc limit 1 ) as lastMessage from chat_groups cg join junction_chat_users_groups j on cg.id = j.groupid where j.userid = #{userId} order by cg.createdat desc
select userid from junction_chat_users_groups where groupid = #{groupId}
select groupid from junction_chat_users_groups where userid = #{userId}
select cg.* from chat_groups cg join junction_chat_users_groups j on cg.id = j.groupid where j.userid = #{userId}
